item.title: Did you know movie and Kevin Kelly's web 3.0
item.author: nikolavp@gmail.com (Nikola Petrov)
item.description: Have you already used twine, if not check it out. It is like a social bookmarking system and i am using it lately extensively for getting the latest information about the semantic technologies and the next generation web 3.0. After using it for about a week or two it starts to “know you” and recommend useful information based on your interest. For example today i got this video with “Did you know” stuff which is mostly mentioning things about the internet but there are some nice facts about the population in USA, India.
